text: "Hell's Greatest Dad" is a song from the American television series Hazbin Hotel. Hazbin Hotel is an adult animated musical comedy. The song is sung primarily by Lucifer Morningstar (voiced by Jeremy Jordan) and Alastor (voiced by Amir Talai). It also has additional parts by Kimiko Glenn and Sarah Stiles. ==References== Category:2024 songs
title: Hell's Greatest Dad
